did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Program Commemorating the Fiftieth Anniversary of the Opening of the University, 1891-1941
did.abstract: Typescript (original) including texts of addresses by officials and former students, and photographs of events on October 4, 1941. Printed program tipped in.

repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections
